mapper.select: SELECT book_id, book_isbn, book_number, book_borrow, book_image, book_title, book_intro, book_author, book_authorintro FROM book WHERE book_isbn LIKE #{bookIsbn} AND book_title LIKE #{bookTitle} AND book_intro LIKE #{bookIntro} AND book_author LIKE #{bookAuthor} ORDER BY book_id
SELECT book_id, book_isbn, book_number, book_borrow, book_image, book_title, book_intro, book_author, book_authorintro FROM book ORDER BY book_id DESC limit #{offset},#{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET book_isbn=#{bookIsbn}, book_number=#{bookNumber}, book_borrow=#{bookBorrow}, book_image=#{bookImage}, book_title=#{bookTitle}, book_intro=#{bookIntro}, book_author=#{bookAuthor}, book_authorintro=#{authorIntro} WHERE book_id=#{bookId}
